description:
Utano, is one year behind Chihaya, is the director of the flower arrangement club. She often visits the gardening club because she likes gardening. Her parents discipline her strictly and she grants it beyond a doubt. But she wants freedom at the bottom of her heart. She has a elegant movements. Other students call her Gozen meaning `her highness` and she often gives someone advice. She is much talked of as the next elder sister. Utano is attached to Chihaya because he doesn`t give her special treatment.
Source: Wiki
name: Sasou Utano
